description:
Enable users to schedule recurring reports (daily, weekly, monthly) with automatic generation and distribution via email or integrated channels. Include customizable report templates and recipient lists with conditional delivery rules.

**Rationale:** Policy teams need regular status updates and briefings without manual effort. Automated reporting ensures stakeholders stay informed and reduces administrative burden on staff.
title: Scheduled Automated Report Distribution
